parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the book to retrieve (图书 ID)

requestBody.description: Book update payload conforming to BookInSchema

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the book to delete

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search in log messages

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start datetime in format YY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End datetime in format YY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of items per page (0 < count < 16)

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: 验证码标记码（JWT），当服务端开启 LOGIN_CAPTCHA 时与请求体中的 captcha 一起用于校验验证码

captcha.description: 验证码（可选，取决于服务端是否启用图形验证码）

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Refresh JWT token in Authorization header. Use the Bearer scheme: "Bearer <refresh_token>"

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access token in the form 'Bearer <JWT token>'. Required for endpoints protected by login_required / AuthorizationBearerSecurity.

200.description: Successful response returning captcha image and tag

400.description: 邮箱已被注册，请重新输入邮箱

message.example: 邮箱已被注册，请重新输入邮箱

parameters.name: gid
parameters.description: Group ID (gid) as specified in the path

400.description: 用户组已存在, 不可创建同名分组

message.default: 用户组已存在, 不可创建同名分组

requestBody.description: Request body for assigning multiple permissions to a group

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of items per page (0 < count < 16)

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: keyword to search in log messages

400.description: 邮箱已被注册，请重新输入邮箱

message.example: 邮箱已被注册，请重新输入邮箱

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer access token. Example: 'Bearer <token>'. This endpoint is protected and requires authentication.

file.description: File to upload. The endpoint accepts one or multiple files in a multipart/form-data request. The backend iterates over request.files and accepts any form field names; clients can supply multiple files either by repeating the 'file' field or by using different field names.

key.description: form field name of the uploaded file

id.description: database id of the stored file record

path.description: relative storage path of the file

url.description: absolute URL to access the stored file
